summary: An ex-Special Forces soldier gets thrown back to medieval times to fulfill an ancient prophecy and ends up finding redemption for his own battlefield experiences.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Lochlyn Munro|Natassia Malthe|Christina Jastrzembska|Aleks Paunovic|Natalie Burn|Elisabeth Rosen|Michael Adamthwaite|Michaela Mann|Noah Beggs|Michael Antonakos|Heather Doerksen|Michael Teigen|Adam Bloch|Reese Alexander|Sean Campbell|Christopher Rosamond|Jamie Switch|Alexandra Robinson|Julia Sandberg Hansson|Paul Lazenby|Ralf Seeger|John Tench
title: En el nombre del rey 2
